## FieldVariable.doClassValidation\_() method

Ensure that the ID belongs to a valid variable of an allowed type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doClassValidation_(opt_newValue?: any): string | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_newValue | any | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID of the new variable to set. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| null

The validated ID, or null if invalid.
